headline: VARIAN MULTI GAUGE CONTROLLER
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model L8350-309 or L8350-301
Description Multi Gauge
Gauge Types Controlled Choose the configuration when ordering
Cables Included No
Accessories

Inquire about gauge cables and gauges

Other Information


Controller will be configured for your specific application, see below.

  • Base Unit, no boards, with fluorescent backlight $599

Controller must be sold with at least one gauge board, add to the price of the base unit.

Choose from the options below:

Option Boards

  • UHV Bayard-Alpert Ion L8321301 $497
  • STD Bayard-Alpert Ion L6427301 $481
  • Inverted Magnetron (for IMG-100) L9066301 $420
  • Cold Cathode board L6433-301 $395
  • Capacitance Manometer L6491301 $450
  • ConvecTorr L9887301 $212
  • Thermocouple L6430301 $269
  • Set Point female D-connector L8327301 $196
  • Set Point male D-connector L8727302 $196
  • RS232 interface L6439301 $209
Software A 2.2 (Varian ASCII protocol)

Other versions of A*.* and P *.* software available, request when ordering, 
this is important if your controller communicates through RS232 interface with external equipment.


Inquire about the boards not listed

Unit is set for 120VAC. Request voltage change to 240VAC if required when ordering

Extended Description Details at -08-091-X MultiGauge controller2007.pdf
Condition Very Good
Refurbished YES
Power Requirements 120/240 V 4.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Depth 15.120 in (38.4 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
